name: Kingdom of Aramos
description: Kingdom of Aramos is a fantasy arena combat zombie shooter (wow that was a mouthful) for the Oculus Quest. It was my first attempt at a VR project. It was just for fun. But it was a good starting point. The computer that had the final version was stolen. All that remains is this early build of it. I decided to post this old project for free to see what you guys think of it. Like I said, this one was just for fun. But, damn, do I wish you guys could have played that final version of it. It had a completely different boss, better enemy AI, and ran a lot smoother because it was optimized a bit more. Long story short, it was MUCH better than this early build that we were left with. But anyway, have fun killing zombies.
